name: module-test
description: A test project for testing TS code in a module.

scripts.build:all: npm run build:ts && npm run build:test
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run lint && npm run build:ts
scripts.test:ts: npm run build:test && istanbul cover jasmine -- JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=test/script/jasmine.json
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:test
